desc: Don't miss your chance on all these updates and renovations! New roof (11/2022) HVAC (2018) water heater (2021) and Square D electric panel. Concrete block 3 bedroom 2 bath home with spacious 2-car carport and storage room. Home was recently updated to include kitchen with stainless appliances and granite countertops, ceramic tile flooring throughout and renovated bathrooms. Indoor laundry/utility room with washer/dryer included. Screened porch with privacy 6ft vinyl fenced back yard. Central location just minutes to shopping, medical, and major highways. Watch rocket launches from your front yard!

*** A Must See! *** This updated townhouse is centrally located to schools, shopping, medical & restaurants with easy access to 95. A long list of updates include: A new roof 2022, Updated Kitchen with new appliances and cabinets, New carpet upstairs, New fresh interior paint, all New Window Treatments, New European Wood Laminate Flooring in the living areas. A fenced courtyard for privacy for your outdoor activities and a great view of the rocket launches. A community pool to have some fun also.
